manifest_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: testground-daemon
  labels:
    app: testground-daemon
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: testground-daemon
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: testground-daemon
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: testground-daemon
      initContainers:
      - name: iproute-add
        image: busybox:1.31.1
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        command:
        - sh
        - -ac
        - 'while [ "$GW" = "" ]; do export GW=$(ip route | grep cni0 | awk ''{print
          $7}''); echo "Got GW: $GW"; sleep 5; done; echo $GW && ip route && ip route
          add 100.64.0.0/16 via $GW && ip route || true;

          '
      containers:
      - name: goproxy
        image: iptestground/goproxy:2.0.2
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
          hostPort: 8081
        volumeMounts:
        - name: envtoml
          mountPath: /root/testground/.env.toml
          subPath: .env.toml
        - name: efs-pvc
          mountPath: /go
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: 512Mi
            cpu: 500m
          limits:
            memory: 512Mi
      - name: testground-daemon
        image: iptestground/testground:edge
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          value: testground-infra-redis-headless
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8042
          hostPort: 8042
        volumeMounts:
        - name: daemon-datadir
          mountPath: /root/testground/
        - name: efs-pvc
          mountPath: /efs
        - name: dockersock
          mountPath: /var/run/docker.sock
        - name: envtoml
          mountPath: /root/testground/.env.toml
          subPath: .env.toml
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: 2048Mi
            cpu: 2000m
          limits:
            memory: 2048Mi
      volumes:
      - name: efs-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: efs
      - name: daemon-datadir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: testground-daemon-datadir-pvc
      - name: dockersock
        hostPath:
          path: /var/run/docker.sock
      - name: envtoml
        configMap:
          name: env-toml-cfg
violation_text: container "iproute-add" has cpu request 0

manifest_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: shippingservice
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: shippingservice
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: shippingservice
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: server
        image: shippingservice
        ports:
        - containerPort: 50051
        env:
        - name: PORT
          value: '50051'
        readinessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 5
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/grpc_health_probe
            - -addr=:50051
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/grpc_health_probe
            - -addr=:50051
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
violation_text: The container "server" is using an invalid container image, "shippingservice". Please use images that are not blocked by the `BlockList` criteria : [".*:(latest)$" "^[^:]*$" "(.*/[^:]+)$"]

manifest_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: strimzi-user-operator
  labels:
    app: strimzi
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: strimzi-user-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: strimzi-user-operator
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: strimzi-user-operator
      containers:
      - name: strimzi-user-operator
        image: quay.io/strimzi/operator:0.25.0
        args:
        - /opt/strimzi/bin/user_operator_run.sh
        env:
        - name: STRIMZI_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: STRIMZI_LABELS
          value: strimzi.io/cluster=my-cluster
        - name: STRIMZI_CA_CERT_NAME
          value: my-cluster-clients-ca-cert
        - name: STRIMZI_CA_KEY_NAME
          value: my-cluster-clients-ca
        - name: STRIMZI_FULL_RECONCILIATION_INTERVAL_MS
          value: '120000'
        - name: STRIMZI_LOG_LEVEL
          value: INFO
        - name: STRIMZI_GC_LOG_ENABLED
          value: 'true'
        - name: STRIMZI_CA_VALIDITY
          value: '365'
        - name: STRIMZI_CA_RENEWAL
          value: '30'
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthy
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 30
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 30
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 256Mi
            cpu: 500m
          requests:
            memory: 256Mi
            cpu: 100m
violation_text: container "strimzi-user-operator" does not have a read-only root file system

manifest_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: sistema-noticias-statefulset
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sistema-noticias
  template:
    metadata:
      name: sistema-noticias
      labels:
        app: sistema-noticias
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: sistema-noticias
        image: aluracursos/sistema-noticias:1
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: sistema-noticias-config-map
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html/uploads
          name: imagens-pvc
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: sessao-pvc
      volumes:
      - name: imagens-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: imagens-pvc
      - name: sessao-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: sessao-pvc
violation_text: container "sistema-noticias" does not have a read-only root file system

manifest_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  namespace: default
  name: micro-api
  labels:
    micro: runtime
    name: micro-api
  annotations:
    name: go.micro.api
    version: latest
    source: github.com/xinhari/hari
    owner: micro
    group: micro
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: micro-api
      micro: runtime
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: micro-api
        micro: runtime
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: api
        env:
        - name: MICRO_AUTH
          value: service
        - name: MICRO_AUTH_PUBLIC_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: micro-keypair
              key: public
        - name: MICRO_API_NAMESPACE
          value: domain
        - name: MICRO_ENABLE_STATS
          value: 'true'
        - name: MICRO_BROKER
          value: nats
        - name: MICRO_BROKER_ADDRESS
          value: nats-cluster
        - name: MICRO_REGISTRY
          value: etcd
        - name: MICRO_REGISTRY_ADDRESS
          value: etcd-cluster-client
        - name: MICRO_REGISTER_TTL
          value: '60'
        - name: MICRO_REGISTER_INTERVAL
          value: '30'
        - name: MICRO_ENABLE_ACME
          value: 'true'
        - name: MICRO_ACME_PROVIDER
          value: certmagic
        - name: MICRO_ACME_HOSTS
          value: '*.micro.mu,*.cloud.micro.mu,micro.mu'
        - name: MICRO_STORE
          value: service
        - name: MICRO_STORE_DATABASE
          value: micro
        - name: MICRO_STORE_TABLE
          value: micro
        - name: CF_API_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: CF_API_TOKEN
              name: cloudflare-credentials
        args:
        - api
        image: agus7fauzi/hari
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        - containerPort: 443
          name: api-port
violation_text: The container "api" is using an invalid container image, "agus7fauzi/hari". Please use images that are not blocked by the `BlockList` criteria : [".*:(latest)$" "^[^:]*$" "(.*/[^:]+)$"]

          value: 'true'

          value: '*.micro.mu,*.cloud.micro.mu,micro.mu'
        - name: MICRO_STORE

          value: micro
        - name: MICRO_STORE_TABLE
          value: micro

manifest_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1

  name: image-downloader
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: image-downloader

    metadata:

        name: image-downloader

      containers:

        image: $CORTEX_IMAGE_PYTHON_PREDICTOR_CPU

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: image-downloader
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: image-downloader
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: image-downloader
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: python-predictor-cpu
        image: $CORTEX_IMAGE_PYTHON_PREDICTOR_CPU
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        args:
        - -c
        - sleep 1000000
      - name: tensorflow-serving-cpu
        image: $CORTEX_IMAGE_TENSORFLOW_SERVING_CPU
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        args:
        - -c
        - sleep 1000000
      - name: tensorflow-predictor
        image: $CORTEX_IMAGE_TENSORFLOW_PREDICTOR
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        args:
        - -c
        - sleep 1000000
      - name: downloader
        image: $CORTEX_IMAGE_DOWNLOADER
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        args:
        - -c
        - sleep 1000000
violation_text: container "tensorflow-predictor" has memory limit 0
